modName: Tony - KILLING PUNCHES - A Hotline Miami Mod
summary:
TONY - KILLING PUNCHES

Ever want to punch something so hard it dies?
Do you hate everyone around you, and want to let them know it?
Well look no further.
descriptionHtml:
This adds Tony's mask to Markarth, in a small chest near the marketplace. Upon wearing this legendary item, you shall be granted the ability to kill just about everything with only your fists. Such power comes at a cost however, as wearing it severely reduces your health and well-being. Being ill-prepared to bestow this beacon of martial prowess upon your face may actually just kill you under the strain of dishonour of being unworthy to master the KILLING PUNCHES.

So basically +2000 unarmed damage, and -200 health. feel free to change this stuff in the CK.

Thanks Dennaton Games for making Hotline Miami
author: orange_sponge
